meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a horse.
meanings.sent1: The toy car had a horsey design with a mane and tail.
meanings.sent2: The girl wore a horsey t-shirt with a picture of a horse on it.
meanings.sent3: The horsey clock in the living room ticked loudly, sounding like hooves.
meanings.sent4: Her horsey laughter echoed through the barn, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The horsey smell of hay and oats brought back memories of the farm.

meanings.definition: Relating to or associated with horses.
meanings.sent1: The horsey sound of hooves on the ground signaled the arrival of the horses.
meanings.sent2: She loved to read horsey books about adventures on horseback.
meanings.sent3: The horsey pattern on her scarf featured galloping horses in a meadow.
meanings.sent4: His horsey behavior made him the perfect candidate for the equestrian team.
meanings.sent5: The horsey neighing in the distance added a touch of countryside charm to the evening.
